title: Boot UEFI 'Win8.1UpdateSE_x64 boot.wim' + BIOS Grub4dos (Easy2Boot) from Hidden Partition of Dual Partition Removable UFD

forumNotes.author: devdevadev
forumNotes.content:
Hello Everyone............  
First tons of thanks to **all Experts** for creating ***'Easy2Boot', 'RMPrepUSB', 'Modified E2B',******'**WinNTSetup3',*****  
*****'Win8.1UpdateSE x64 boot.wim',********'UFD FORMAT.exe', 'UEFI MULTI.exe', 'Bootice.exe' etc........***  
I need help of all Expert in order to complete this tutorial so please help me by suggesting Step by Step Procedure............  
Currently I have following three expected configuration in my mind according to priority basis in order to  
**Boot UEFI 'Win8.1UpdateSE_x64 boot.wim' + BIOS Grub4dos(Easy2Boot) from Hidden Partition** of  
Dual Partition Removable USB Drive.  
1. (Most Desired Configuration)  
**---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**  
**Partition 1 - FAT32/NTFS - Data Partition - Storage Purpose**  
**Partition 2 - FAT32/NTFS - E2B Partition - Easy2Boot files + Required Boot Manager files with 'Win8.1UpdateSE x64 boot.wim'**  
**---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**  
2. (Satisfactory Configuration)  
**---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**  
**Partition 1 - FAT32/NTFS - Data Partition - Storage Purpose + Required Boot Manager files**  
**Partition 2 - FAT32/NTFS - E2B Partition - Easy2Boot files + 'Win8.1UpdateSE x64 boot.wim'**  
**---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**  
3. (Feel good Configuration)  
**---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**  
**Partition 1 - FAT32/NTFS - Data Partition - Storage Purpose + Required Boot Manager files with 'Win8.1UpdateSE x64 boot.wim'**  
**Partition 2 - FAT32/NTFS - E2B Partition - Easy2Boot files**  
**------------------------------ ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------**  
Actually I want to create a Dual Partition USB Drive so that It's **'E2B Partition' will be Hidden** and 'Data Partition' will be  
Visible in Windows. **'Easy****2B** **oot files'** must be within hidden 'E2B Partition', while **'**Required Boot Manager files'****  
****and 'Win8.1UpdateSE x64 boot.wim'****can be within either 'E2B Partition' or 'Data Partition' so that USB Drive will show both ***'Boot Manager'*** and ***'Grub4dos'***menu option during USB Booting .  
***'Boot Manager'*** menu entry should boot to**'Win8.1UpdateSE x64 boot.wim'** in both **UEFI** and **BIOS** mode while ***'Grub4dos'*** menu entry should boot to **'Easy2Boot'** in **BIOS** mode only.  
i.e.  
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Boot UEFI + BIOS with 'Win8.1UpdateSE x64 boot.wim' direct from Boot Manager Menu into RAMDISK
Boot UEFI - F12 - BIOS - Grub4dos - (Easy2Boot) +/ (Win XP/7/8 VHD - Ramdisk)**

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  
I need help of Experts so that I can convert my USB Drive according to **Configuration 1** if possible otherwise can prefer **Configuration 2/3** if possible. I request to everyone to share their precious ideas regarding this topic in order to complete this tutorial. Please Command and Reply as soon as possible.........................  
**Thanks in Advance to Everyone.................**

forumNotes.author: alacran
forumNotes.content:
This is my Adata 32 GB USB flash disk with two partitions:

1.- First primary partition 1.9 GB FAT32 type active partition; used UEFI_MULTI to copy Win8.1SE_x64 boot.wim file to root, an several other ISO's to directory Images, and make the boot files and EFI folder also Grub4dos mbr and grldr and make BCD option to boot Grub4dos. + I manually added BootIce.

2.- Second primary partition 28 GB exFAT; after make it visible to windows using BootIce, manualy copied Win7 and Win8 install ISO's, + WinNTSetup (BootIce included in tools folder).

3.- Boot from USB to Win8.1SE_x64 boot.wim. I let the second partition visible to Windows, It booted just fine, so no need to switch back every boot.

Regards

Hello**'alacran'**............

Thanks for sharing such a useful and precious tutorial with detailed info............

**Questions-**

**1-** Is your Adata 32 GB USB flash disk **'Removable'**or 'Fixed' ?
